member.name: T:System.Web.Helpers.ObjectInfo
member.summary: Renders the property names and values of the specified object and any subobjects that it references.

member.name: M:System.Web.Helpers.ObjectInfo.Print(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Renders the property names and values of the specified object and any subobjects that it references.
member.returns: For a simple variable, returns the type and the value. For an object that contains multiple items, returns the property name or key, and the value for each property.
member.param: The object to render information for.
Optional. Specifies the depth of nested subobjects to render information for. The default is 10.
Optional. Specifies the maximum number of characters that the method displays for object values. The default is 1000.
member.exception: is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: T:System.Web.Helpers.SortDirection
member.summary: Specifies the direction in which to sort a list of items.

member.name: F:System.Web.Helpers.SortDirection.Ascending
member.summary: Sort from smallest to largest. For example, from A to Z.

member.name: F:System.Web.Helpers.SortDirection.Descending
member.summary: Sort from largest to smallest. For example, from Z to A.

member.name: T:System.Web.Helpers.WebCache
member.summary: Provides a cache to store frequently accessed data.

member.name: M:System.Web.Helpers.WebCache.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the specified item from the object.
member.returns: The item retrieved from the cache, or null if the item is not found.
member.param: The identifier for the cache item to retrieve.

member.name: M:System.Web.Helpers.WebCache.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified item from the object.
member.returns: The item removed from the object. If the item is not found, returns null.
member.param: The identifier for the cache item to remove.

member.name: M:System.Web.Helpers.WebCache.Set(System.String,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inserts an item into the object.
member.param: The identifier for the cache item.
The data to insert into the cache.
Optional. The number of minutes to keep an item in the cache. The default is 20.

Optional. true to indicate that the cache item expiration is reset each time the item is accessed, or false to indicate that the expiration is based on an absolute interval since the time that the item was added to the cache. The default is true, which means that, if you also use the default value for the parameter, a cached item expires 20 minutes after it was last accessed.
member.exception: The value of is less than or equal to zero.
Sliding expiration is enabled and the value of is greater than a year.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) is used to encrypt the connection when sending email.
member.returns: true if SSL is used to encrypt the connection; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Sends the specified message to an SMTP server for delivery.

The subject line for the email message.
